alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 7:31PM EDT until May 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... Northern Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Western Orleans County in northeastern Vermont... East central Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 730 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eden Mills, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Irasburg, Eden, Westfield, Glover, Albany, Barton, Barton Village, Albany Village, Lowell, Craftsbury, Wolcott, Jay, Troy, Belvidere, Hyde Park, Montgomery, Greensboro, Newport Town, West Glover and South Albany. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
